author: USA TODAY, Sara M Moniuszko, USA TODAY
title: John Cho pens powerful essay on Asian American discrimination amid coronavirus pandemic
description: John Cho is speaking up about Asian American discrimination amid the coronavirus pandemic in an essay published in the Los Angeles Times.
content:
Speaking from New Mexico. Idris Elba says he and his wife had their lives "turned around" after contracting the coronavirus and admits he can't wait to go home. (April 20)
